name: Data Structures & Algorithms Learning Plugin
description: Comprehensive Data Structures & Algorithms learning system with 7 specialized agents, interactive skills, and real-world problem-solving strategies
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Complexity Analysis Specialist
agents.description: Master Big-O notation, space-time tradeoffs, and algorithm analysis

agents.name: Linear Structures Expert
agents.description: Master arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and their applications

agents.name: Tree Structures Master
agents.description: Comprehensive guide to BST, AVL, heap, trie, and tree problems

agents.name: Graph Algorithms Guide
agents.description: Graph theory, traversal, shortest path, topological sort, and advanced algorithms

agents.name: Dynamic Programming Strategist
agents.description: DP problem-solving strategies, optimization techniques, and pattern recognition

agents.name: Sorting & Searching Optimizer
agents.description: Master all sorting algorithms, binary search variations, and selection algorithms

agents.name: Advanced Techniques & Interview Prep
agents.description: System design integration, mock interviews, LeetCode strategies, and real-world applications

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start learning journey and select your skill level

commands.name: browse-agent
commands.description: Explore all 7 specialized agents and their capabilities

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Take knowledge assessment test for your level

commands.name: interview-prep
commands.description: Prepare for coding interviews with curated problems

skills.name: Complexity Analysis
skills.description: Big-O notation, time/space complexity, amortized analysis

skills.name: Linear Data Structures
skills.description: Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues, and circular variants

skills.name: Tree Data Structures
skills.description: Binary Trees, BST, AVL, Heaps, Tries, Segment Trees

skills.name: Graph Algorithms
skills.description: BFS, DFS, Dijkstra, Bellman-Ford, Kruskal, Prim's, Topological Sort

skills.name: Dynamic Programming
skills.description: Memoization, tabulation, DP on trees, interval DP, digit DP

skills.name: Sorting & Searching
skills.description: All sorting algorithms, binary search, selection algorithms, partitioning

skills.name: Advanced Techniques
skills.description: Greedy, backtracking, two-pointers, sliding window, segment trees, union-find

installation.quick_start: Add to Claude Code: plugins add ./custom-plugin-data-structures-algorithms
installation.system_requirements: Claude Code or compatible AI platform
